XenotypeDef.label: Yautja
XenotypeDef.description: Yautja are extra terrestrial hunters that hail from the planet Yautja Prime. They are prolific killers with a fondness for the art of hunting, basing their entire society around it. Those who do not respect the honor and tradition of the hunt are banished.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Yautja are extra terrestrials with an intense skill and fondness for hunting.
